segments.text: Honestly, this whole situation is quite frustrating to observe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer carelessness with the running water is just mind-boggling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Who leaves a faucet running to overflow like that without a plug?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s going to cause so much damage to the kitchen, I can practically see it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And then, the children are adding to the potential chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy on the stool is an accident waiting to happen, truly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't anyone in this house pay attention to anything?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical in its absurdity, but with serious consequences.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so expectant, just waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They think they're so clever, getting cookies behind the adult's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit of exasperation at the scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to intervene here before things get truly out of hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's an absolute mess of oblivious adults and mischievous children.
segments.speaker: PAR
